Text.content: We start with a tiny demo-site of the fictitious company "WriteAndDelete". It has just a few pages an exists in English. We add German and French as additional languages.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
You can download the content of the site here. You need to have the Apollo demo modules installed. Then you can add a new site to your OpenCms installation and choose the Apollo template JSP as template (i.e., /system/modules/org.opencms.apollo/templates/apollo-page.jsp). Import the content into that site.
The demo contents will only work with OpenCms 10.5.1.
